column1: Table S11: Macroevolutionary correlates of interspecific variation in tail prehensility. Shown are the results of a Bayesian phylogenetic logistic regression, computed in MCMCglmm. Statistically significant coefficients are highlighted in grey. Note that there are no instances of prehensility in the Anomaluromorpha, the Castorimorpha, or the Scurimorpha, and thus these suborders are omitted from the analysis.
